titles: The ansvveres of some brethren of the ministerie to the replyes of the ministers and professours of divinitie in Aberdeene, concerning the late convenant.
author: Henderson, Alexander, 1583?-1646.

notes: Signed at end: Master Alexander Hamilton, Master David Dickson.
